name: DEAD OR SCHOOL
description: Underground dwelling girl Hisako is aiming for the surface in a zombie infested Tokyo. Hack and slash RPG! Obtain weapons and gear from enemies, and customize your skill tree to create your own unique and powerful a character!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows10, 8, 7 Processor: Amd A10-8750 Graphics: Radeon R7 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows10, 8, 7 Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 Graphics: NVIDIA  GeForce GTX 500 Series Storage: 6 GB available space
